int32_t gaia::net::SSLInfo::getCertStatus ( ) const [inline]

Bitmask of status info of the certificate.

Representing, for example, known errors and extended validation (EV) status.

Returns:
Bitmask of status of certificate.

int32_t gaia::net::SSLInfo::getSecurityBits ( ) const [inline]

The security strength, in bits, of the SSL cipher suite.

0 means the connection is not encrypted. -1 means the security strength is unknown.

Returns:
security strength.

Definition at line 100 of file SSLInfo.h.

References mSecurityBits.

bool gaia::net::SSLInfo::isCertIssuedByKnownRoot ( ) const [inline]

If the certificate is valid, then this is true iff it was rooted at a standard CA root.

(As opposed to a user-installed root.)

Returns:
True if certificate is issued by known root.
